targets.query:
from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total") // Get the total average, not per-core
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value })) // Invert Idle to get Busy
  |> yield(name: "cpu_busy")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "load_1m")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "ram_used")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/") // Select Root Partition
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["host", "path"])
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "disk_used")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "io_wait")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "cores")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "ram_total")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/") // Ensures we only look at the main drive
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> group(columns: ["host", "path"])
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "disk_total")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "uptime")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "load")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "mmcblk0")  // 'mmcblk0' is usually the Pi SD card. If empty, remove this line.
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writes" or r["_field"] == "reads")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) // Converts total count to "per second"
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "iops")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_user")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

writes = from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "mmcblk0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

write_time = from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "mmcblk0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_time")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

join(tables: {w: writes, t: write_time}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r._value_w > 0.0 then r._value_t / r._value_w else 0.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "avg_write_latency_ms")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_running")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "running")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"]) // Group by name so each line is a container
  |> yield(name: "cpu_usage")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "restart_count")
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) 
  |> yield(name: "restarts")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "home_network_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signal_quality")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "home_network_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packet_loss")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "loss")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "home_network_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_latency_ms" or r["_field"] == "lan_latency_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0" or r["interface"] == "wlan0") // Pick your active interface
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) // Converts "Total Bytes" to "Bytes per Second"
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8.0})) // Optional: Convert Bytes to Bits (standard for network speeds)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "bandwidth")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "home_network_health")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "server_download_mbps" or r["_field"] == "server_upload_mbps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  // v6 Field Name
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queries_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  // v6 Field Name (if this is empty, try 'ads_percentage_today')
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queries_percent_blocked") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "percent_blocked")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "gravity_domains_being_blocked") 
  |> last()

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queries_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true) // Shows rate of change (queries per minute)
  |> yield(name: "Total Queries")

from(bucket: "smart_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queries_blocked")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "Ads Blocked")
